blur.description: Fires the moment that the element loses focus.

focus.description: Fires the moment when the element gets focus.

select.description: Fires after some text has been selected in an element.

keydown.description: Fires when a user is pressing a key.

args.name: e
args.description: Fires when a user presses a key.

keypress.description: Fires when a user is pressing a key.

keyup.description: Fires when a user releases a key.

click.description: Fires on a mouse click on the element.

dblclick.description: Fires on a mouse double-click on the element.

mousedown.description: Fires when a mouse button is pressed down on an element.

mousemove.description: Fires when the mouse pointer moves over an element.

mouseout.description: Fires when the mouse pointer moves out of an element.

mouseover.description: Fires when the mouse pointer moves over an element.

mouseup.description: Fires when a mouse button is released over an element.

name.description: Specifies a name for the button

value.description: Specifies an initial value for the button

disabled.description: Specifies that a button should be disabled

autofocus.description: Specifies that a button should automatically get focus when the page loads

form.description: Specifies one or more forms the button belongs to

action.description: Specifies where to send the form-data when a form is submitted. Only for type="submit"

enctype.description: Specifies where to send the form-data when a form is submitted. Only for type="submit"

valueOptions.name: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
valueOptions.description: All characters will be encoded before sent.

valueOptions.name: multipart/form-data
valueOptions.description: No characters are encoded (use this when you are using forms that have a file upload control).

valueOptions.name: text/plain
valueOptions.description: Spaces are converted to "+" symbols, but no characters are encoded.

novalidate.description: Specifies that the form-data should not be validated on submission. Only for type="submit"

target.description: Specifies where to display the response after submitting the form. Only for type="submit"

valueOptions.name: _blank
valueOptions.description: Loads the response in a new window/tab.

valueOptions.name: _self
valueOptions.description: Loads the response in the same frame.

valueOptions.name: _parent
valueOptions.description: Loads the response in the parent frame.

valueOptions.name: _top
valueOptions.description: Loads the response in the full body of the window.

accesskey.description: Specifies a shortcut key to activate/focus an element

contenteditable.description: Specifies whether the content of an element is editable or not.

lang.description: Specifies the language of the element's content.

style.description: Specifies an inline CSS style for an element.

tabindex.description: Specifies the tabbing order of an element.

title.description: Specifies extra information about an element.

translate.description: Specifies whether the content of an element should be translated or not.
